I'm back.

By Dark Phoenix on Tuesday, July 27, 2004 - 02:30 pm:

Well, I have been away from MR and the Internet for awhile. Thanks to some friends of mine, my interest in MR has been rekindled. Though I don't have MR3 or MR4 yet, I hope to rectify that situation soon:) For the time being, I plan to pass time raising monsters and maybe livening up the tournament scene a little.

It's good to be back.

DP
